data.eml:eml: New and remarkable Asian and North African species of Colletes Latreille (Hymenoptera: Colletidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kuhlmann, Michael, Proshchalykin, Maxim Yu. (2015): New and remarkable Asian and North African species of Colletes Latreille (Hymenoptera: Colletidae). Zootaxa 4028 (1): 81-101, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4028.1.3
